title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5704.1 - Schedule of tolls
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5704.1 - Schedule of tolls

State Regulations

Effective July 12, 2006, tolls are as follows: Type of vehicle

Proposed toll rate

Auto (one way).............................. $2.75
2-axle truck.............................. 5.00
3-axle truck.............................. 6.00
4-axle truck.............................. 6.50
5-axle truck.............................. 8.50
6-axle truck.............................. 10.00
7-axle truck.............................. 11.50
8-axle truck.............................. 13.00
9-axle truck.............................. 14.50
10-axle truck.............................. 16.00

Additional axles.............................. 1.00

Buses: School.............................. 2.00

Commercial.............................. 5.00

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5704.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
